AddressContainerInterface¶

class AddressBook.AddressContainerInterface.AddressContainerInterface[source]¶

An abstract base class that defines the interface for an address container, which can store, retrieve, update, and delete addresses, as well as handle file operations and birthday notifications.

abstract add_address(address)[source]¶

Add a new address to the address book.

Parameters:

address (Address) – The address object to add (can be a dictionary or AddressBook instance).

Returns:

The ID of the newly added address.

Return type:

int

abstract close()[source]¶

Close the currently opened database file. Ensure that all resources, such as file handlers, are properly released.

abstract delete(id_)[source]¶

Delete an address by its ID.

Parameters:

id (int) – The ID of the address to delete.

Returns:

The ID of the deleted address if successful, or None if the ID doesn’t exist.

Return type:

int or None:

abstract get(id_)[source]¶

Retrieve a specific address by its ID.

Parameters:

id (int) – The ID of the address to retrieve.

Returns:

The address if found, or None if the ID does not exist.

Return type:

Address, None

abstract get_all()[source]¶

Retrieve all addresses stored in the address book.

Returns:

A dictionary where keys are IDs and values are address objects.

Return type:

dict[int, Address]

abstract get_todays_birthdays()[source]¶

Retrieve addresses of persons who have their birthday today.

Returns:

A dictionary where keys are IDs and values are addresses of people whose birthday is today.

Return type:

dict[int, Address]

abstract open()[source]¶

Open the database file for reading or writing. If the file doesn’t exist, it creates a new one.

abstract save()[source]¶

Save any changes made to the database. This function should write the current state of the address book to the file.

abstract search(field, search_string)[source]¶

Search for a string in a specific field (e.g., name, phone, email). Return a dictionary containing all matching addresses.

Parameters:

  • field (str) – The field to search within.

  • search_string (str) – The search term to look for.

Returns:

A dictionary where keys are IDs and values are matching addresses.

Return type:

dict[int, Address]

abstract set_filepath(filepath)[source]¶

Set the file path for the database.

Parameters:

filepath (str) – PATH to the file

abstract update(id_, **kwargs)[source]¶

Update an existing address by its ID.

Parameters:

  • id (int) – The ID of the address to update.

  • kwargs – Key-value pairs of fields to update in the address.

Returns:

The ID of the updated address if successful.

Return type:

int

Raises:

KeyError – If the address with the specified ID is not found.
